channel.title: [PI] How control panels pops out in command [PI]
channel.description:
I followed this tut: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/320061-pi-adding-my-control-panel-your-server.html
How can i make a command, so it pops out who did the command.

item.title: [PI] How control panels pops out in command [PI]
item.dc:creator: @RuneForceGame RuneForceGame
item.description:
@RuneForceGame wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:545947”]You can’t.
At least, not the way it’s currently added.

You would have to add it client sided, and then send the data from the client to the server.[/quote]

Oh ok, Thanks

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How control panels pops out in command [PI]

item.title: [PI] How control panels pops out in command [PI]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

You can’t.
At least, not the way it’s currently added.

You would have to add it client sided, and then send the data from the client to the server.

Read full topic
